forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
